headline: The Rush to Save Joeys and More Amid Australia’s Inferno
abstract: Millions of animals, many found on no other continent, may have perished, and Australians are taking care of survivors.
lead_paragraph: WATERHOLES, Australia — The convoy of vehicles fleeing a raging inferno in the forest of southeastern Australia ferried a copious cargo: 11 koalas, 15 kangaroos, five chickens, two possums, two dogs and a lorikeet.
